review:
Dr Rupali has played a role of an angel in my life â¤ï¸
I came to her when I was 9 months pregnant. My case was complicated as I suffered from vaginal infection during the 9th month.. I lost all my hopes for normal delivery, but she helped me like a goddess. She explains everything before going for any procedure. Very polite and very friendly..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
2 year back, I went to mam with complain of irregular postmenopausal bleeding of my mother, and at that time i was very much tense with multiple possiblities , mam took the charge and diagnosed it correctly , and still when my wife was pregnent their guidance and mangement led it be a normal delivery (in the world of cesarian loving doctors) . I strongly recommend mam to every obs and gyni related complain , they gives time to patient, explains every treatment option and then helps to choose the best option. 
Thank u mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was detected with a fibroid and consulted Dr. Rupali. She not performed the complex surgery but also counseled and guided me throughout, which is extremely important for a patient undergoing such a procedure for the first time. What set her apart from other Doctors was that she was extremely approachable (even at wee hours of the night) and explained the intricacies of the disease as well as the entire treatment and recovery journey to me in a very detailed manner - this really helped me prepare myself mentally. I would highly recommend her for all your gynae needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr Rupali, as she explains each and every thing very clearly to the patient. Pregnancy is a difficult yet beautiful journey and during this journey she has guided me very well. 
She is very approachable, and is reachable at any hour of the day. In my case I have approached her at 4am as well and she helped me. 
These days, whenever we visit a doctor, they will prescribe certain medications but will not explain the reason for the same but with her she would explain the reason behind each and everything.
reply_text: Thank you so much dear for the appreciation ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™ğŸ»

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from the problem of endometriosis since 2012 and visited many doctors for the same. In the current year 2020 my problem became severe and Dr Rupali Chadda suggested me a surgery for the permanent solution of my problem. I went with her suggestion and got removed uterus and ovaries successfully. Where the other doctors were finding it complicated, she did her job imminently without any flaw. Throughout the treatment period Dr Rupali Chadda helped me in all ways. I found her very experienced *** ************** All of the above she is too kind and full of humanity. I am very grateful that I met with such a wonderful doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rupali, has been a great support throughout my treatment journey. I had hemorrhagic cyst . She guided me well through the whole process and a detailed explanation. I had texted her at times in the night due to ask a question or if I was having some pain. Everytime she has picked up the call and responded to my query.
I would definitely recommend her. :)
reply_text: Thank you so much dear ğŸ™ğŸ»

review: I am really great ful that I consulted Dr. Rupali during my wife's pregnancy. She is very calm, composed, highly knowledgeable and experienced doctor. And to the top of all she was always available for any query at any hour. Highly indebted to her for her support throughout our journey. I would highly recommend her to everyone. No second thought. Thank you ma'am once again.

I would like to recommend dr rupali as she  stands as a barrier to protect me and give me support in my difficult time like a family..she knows how to calm a person and to make someone smile...she listen very attentively and diagnose very well...i am a medico as well...and may be thats y i know she is an amazing doctor any patient can ever have..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I live in Europe and married for few years . I had multiple fibroids leading to infertility.I visited India and met Dr. Rupali Chadha and immediately without a second  thought I decided to get operated by her.It was a very complicated operation as I had more than 15 fibroids which took more than 2 hrs. to operate.She is highly professional ,humble and caring person I have ever met.She is extremely dedicated and loving towards her patients.You will always feel safe with her because she will treat you as a family. Thank You !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

review: Very caring and helpful doctor.  4 days after the surgery late night  I started bleeding from one stitch. I left her a msg since it was quite late. Within 5 mins she called me and on phone she told me to put a tegaderm bandage after cleaning the area. In case of any emergency I can call her at any time. . She was there for me in my hour of need. Thanks a lot.

review:
My niece's Eva kimthianpui was born on October 13 2020,under the care of Dr. Rupali. Dear ma'am
I will forever remember your wonderful treatment and care for both the baby and my sister. No words would ever be enough to express our gratitude. Thank you for bringing our angle to Earth.

tags: Value for money,

review: Dr .Rupali is a very empathetic and caring doctor with a very friendly and genuienly caring attitude towards her patient, not only this but also she understands and listens to your problems very nicely . glad that i came to her for my c section and ANCs . You can just close your eyes and go to her , trust her  for sure you are not going to get disappointment .

I had a wonderful experience with Dr.Rupali
She is such a dedicated, thoughtful and compassionate doctor.she always work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome.
She help me delivered my bundle of joy 
"my daughter" without any problem.
Feel so blessed to know u Ma'am.
